title: Which Font Is This?
content:
Does anybody know what font this is?

Also, do you know of a place where i can find similar droplet shapes?

Thank You

| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234725/http:/typophile.com/files/font_80.jpg) | 9.4 KB |

 [‹ Modern static serif; rather narrow, with high contrast](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234725/http:/typophile.com/node/39999 "Go to previous forum topic") [Which font is this? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234725/http:/typophile.com/node/39984 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ekatlaterrible

comments.content: The blocky typeface looks like [Geist RND](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213234725/http:/www.frede.net/geist.html) by Frederik Frede.
